subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Michael Gilchrist had 30 points and 15 rebounds to lead the United States to a 103-80 victory over Canada in the semifinals of FIBA’s Under-17 World Championships in Hamburg, Germany.
snippet: Michael Gilchrist had 30 points and 15 rebounds to lead the United States to a 103-80 victory over Canada in the semifinals of FIBA’s Under-17 World Championships in Hamburg, Germany.
